item.title: Creating my website in Github Pages using Hugo
item.description: Background I have purchased the domain ozyinc.com a long time ago to host custom servers (work-related, hobby and Minecraft ðŸ˜„ ), VPN server, etc… however I have never started building my own website and for many years the homepage was an Express server behind an NGINX reverse proxy displaying Hello World on GET /. The case with Elm and not-ever-finishing website Then, one day I wanted to try using Elm to build my customized page, being accustomed to the ecosystem for some time.
